title: Fort Sumter National Monument: Plan A Field Trip
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Plan A Field Trip               Plan A Field Trip       Fort Sumter National Monument is comprised of two main sites: Fort Sumter in Charleston Harbor and Fort Moultrie on Sullivan's Island. The sites are administered together by the National Park Service; but because a boat is needed to reach Fort Sumter, there are different requirements for scheduling school group visits to each site. Please choose the site you wish to visit for more information on how to schedule a field trip for your school group: Fort Sumter Field Trip Fort Moultrie Field Trip
